website_summaries.verdict: One of the more popular onesies available, this option is a great choice for those wanting non-themed pajamas.
pros: Available in a variety of colors and designs for both men and women
Made with remarkably soft fleece and an oversized design for comfort
cons: The bottom of the feet are extremely slippery on wooden flooring

customer_reviews.title: I read that they run a little big and I'm ...
customer_reviews.text: I read that they run a little big and I'm just between a medium and large so I ordered medium and all the length fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Harding

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: My son LOVES these! I chose the size based on the previous reviews and they fit perfectly. He's a skinny teen, about 5-5 so I ordered an adult small and they are perfect. Lots of extra room to go around but that just makes them even cozier. The drop back and dual ended zipper are great details so one doesn't have to freeze when using the bathroom. Heavy, quality fleece. Actually the second pair I ordered. Had ordered a pair for his big brother (6' - got him the medium) and we all loved the quality so much I had to order another pair!
customer_reviews.author: M.L. Andersen

customer_reviews.title: A Christmas Miracle
customer_reviews.text: Alright, where do I start? This thing rocks. I love Christmas, I love comfort, I love a dropseat for bathroom convenience. At first my boyfriend (Dan) made fun of me for purchasing this, but after seeing me traipsing around the house practically oozing Christmas magic, I know he's probably secretly jealous. This onesie has everything: feeties, dropseat, hood with drawstrings, and a fashionable wintery print. Honestly, what more could you ask for? P.S. As others have mentioned, it's big (I am 5'3" and bought Xsmall - still huge), but I mean, who needs a form-fitting jumpsuit when you're busy shoveling Christmas cookies down your gullet?
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Im 6ft, very large chested, 250lbs. I usually wear a womens 2XL. I got a size XL and its perfect! Very soft! Thick and comfy. The zippers are good quality. The pockets are deep! Plenty of leg room, and the arms are just right. The only thing I dont like are how huge the feet are. I guess for guys that have HUGE feet this is great. I would guess it would fit a mens 13/14 shoe? It bunches up at the bottom because of how long the legs anyway, so you dont notice the big feet much anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Know that this is heaven and your not invited ‘till you buy one😴🤟
customer_reviews.text: This is LITERALLY the softest thing I ever felt thanks forever lazy for making the best product one can buy. It’s literally so warm, blocks out bugs on camping trips, and has multiple detachable pieces to adjust your temp. (For example: detachable feet!) Honeslty if your looking for a blacket just buy this it’s already survived 59 washes and still pillow soft.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Ferrara

customer_reviews.title: Great size description from the company
customer_reviews.text: Great size description from the company. My boyfriend is 6'5", 275lbs, and the 2XL fits great. They are roomy enough that he's comfortable laying around. His feet are size 12, and these have a lot of room left in the feet, might actually take them in a bit at the toe. They have deep pockets, zip back flap, zip up from the bottom and down from top on the front (for boy bathroom business I guess), and are SUPER soft. SO cute, such a great gift to get him! And now I can keep the house as cold as I want and he can stay warm. :)
customer_reviews.author: Jill Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable roomy fit except the FEET part
customer_reviews.text: I bought this footed PJ for my son who is 5’3” and 115lb. The size is XSmall Men which is perfect for his height. Snuggling feet for both height and weight. However there is one negative side of this PJ. It is FEET Part!!! My son wears size 9 shoes. It was way too tight for him to put his feet in the PJ. Besides the room for feet, this PJ is very comfortable and cozy. Also my son loves to have hoodie. The color I bought is RED. This red is rather bright red with little bit of orange color red.
customer_reviews.author: AthletsMom

customer_reviews.title: This will change your life
customer_reviews.text: Read the sizing chart. If you want absolutely ridiculously baggy get based on the chart, if not order down a size. I think Forever Lazy explained this accurately and therefore my product fit as expected. This thing will change your life. Butt flap is large enough for violent pooping without contamination. Feet zip off easily for use with real shoes. Its warm, but can be ventilated through but flap and crotch. Biggest problem is that girls won't stop surrounding me, talking to me, asking me on dates, and wanting to have my babies when I wear this. That makes my wife angry.
customer_reviews.author: Bill C

customer_reviews.title: Warm and roomy
customer_reviews.text: These run large in the fit, but as they are supposed to. I find mine (I have two) very comfortable. My only complaint is that on my first set, the zipper for the rear flap broke and I had to get the second pair. The zipper works, but only running one way. It broke fairly soon after I got them, so I was disappointed. However, I've had no problems with my second pair, so I think it was a fluke. Anyway, I love these and practically live in them during the winter.
customer_reviews.author: Wintermask

customer_reviews.title: Best onesie we have found
customer_reviews.text: Great onesie! My teen son wears a size large shirt and 34x32 pants and absolutely hates tight fitting cloths, especially in the seat of the pants. I was scared, but followed the sizing guide of the manufacturer and purchased a size Medium. I fits wonderfully. It is loose, but not too loose, just perfect for comfy lounging. The material is nice, has washed well and his guy friends are envious. My son has had several other pairs of onesie pjs and each time felt they were either too thin, too short or too tight. Not these! I will purchase a second pair I am sure.
customer_reviews.author: shellmich17

customer_reviews.title: Wow - Nice Fit!
customer_reviews.text: I usually / NEVER add photos of myself for a review (seller you owe me... lol). I'm 6 foot and 200 lbs. Shoe size 12 1/2. This Large size Adult Onsie fits perfect. Didn't want anything tight, wanted some room without being baggy. This suit fits the ticket... Zippers are very smooth, hoodie is large and fits well. Deep pockets and large back flap with zipper when needed. I'm wearing my socks with the suit on, so they are just an added bonus of warmth for my feet. The fleece material is thick, but not too dense. It should breathe well when I sleep - Overall very pleased with purchase. Hope this helps...
customer_reviews.author: fire1962

customer_reviews.title: Runs Big
customer_reviews.text: 'm 5'4 150lbs ordered a XS based on their sizing chart..I expected it to be baggy, but it's HUGE as far as height goes, someone over 6ft can fit into the XS that was sent to me. I think even the XXS would also be too big based on what I have seen in person. I ordered two different prints in XS and they are both better suited for someone who is 5'10-6'3 or so. They are also very very thick, which is great if you live in a super cold climate..a bit warm for us Houstonians.
customer_reviews.author: Amy LaFavers

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband for a Halloween costume and it is so amazing. He has been wearing it almost daily just to hang out. I want one now! The butt flap and pockets make this the best onesie! Several people want one after seeing his too! The only thing to note is this is one with feet (they make them without feet too) and sometimes that can get hot. We might try to sew in zippers to make ventilation holes! I am pretty sure we will be buying some more for Christmas gifts, one for me included!
customer_reviews.author: Lo

customer_reviews.title: comfortable and warm
customer_reviews.text: I have worn it every night since I bought it several weeks ago. It is comfortable, warm, and has good quality zippers. Between the zippers and the rear flap, it is simple to use the toilet without removing the pajamas. Mine have the footsies. I am always colder than most people so I also wear an undershirt with it. The footsies are as thick as heavier socks and it is very easy to wear bedroom slippers over them. I am 5 ft 11 inches and 188 pounds with wide shoulders. I usually wear XL. But I chose large and they fit great even after washing and dryer twice so far.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Loved these!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for the entire family for Christmas. We are a tall family, so I followed all the guidelines and they fit well. The one thing we could all use is bigger feet. My son and husband have a size 13 foot and the feet are small, but it doesn't seem to bug them too much. I have a size women's 11 and my feet are small as well. I figure if they get too annoying, I will cut the off. This was a great gift, my family loved them!!! Also, these are a perfect weight, not too thick so you don't get too hot.
customer_reviews.author: Sophie

customer_reviews.title: Best onesie for adults that I have owned!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! I am 5"8 and weigh 125 lbs. I ordered a small but could have definitely gotten an extra small. This does not bother me though. It is very comfy, has lots of room, and easy to move in. I wear it outside during the cold summer nights while hanging out with my family on our deck. This is the only onesie that I have found that has the feet, hood, and zipper to use the bathroom. So glad I bought this! I bought one for my fiance who loved mine. I ordered him the american flag one.
customer_reviews.author: nicole

customer_reviews.title: very comfortable but BIG
customer_reviews.text: It is very comfortable and looks great, but it is definitely a lot baggier than I expected. I am a fit, 5'8" male at 185 lbs, and ordered a size Small expecting to have to return it. Surprisingly it was almost too big! I definitely won't be wearing it out socially anyways (other than the two ugly sweater parties I got it for) so it will definitely make for a comfortable outfit around the house on colder nights. The zippers are very convenient but I wish the butt flap was the old button style instead of a giant zipper area. Definitely a great purchase but be careful of the sizing.
customer_reviews.author: Steve D

customer_reviews.title: XXS was WAY too big and arrived stinking of smoke!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one I’ve ordered in the same size. The first one was perfect. This one arrived REEKING of cigarette smoke and was WAY too big. How can the same size as the other pair be so much bigger? Buy these pajamas if you want to look like an adult wearing a 40 pound dirty diaper!!
customer_reviews.author: Jan S

customer_reviews.title: Soft and cozy with zippers where you need them.
customer_reviews.text: Love these. Warm and soft with zippers where you need them for both ladies and gents. Legs are long (5' 9") and having bought footie pjs before...great for sleeping in or your toes will press against slipper parts as you stretch out in sleep. Arms a bit short and very baggie at center but I'm 125lbs so not upset at all there is room to toss and turn under covers on cold Midwestern nights.
customer_reviews.author: justme

customer_reviews.title: Great onesie and such a good quality and design
customer_reviews.text: Love this and the size is just perfect. I'm usually between sizes 18-22 on dresses and pants so I was unsure which size to order so I've ordered M and L and let me tell you that the M looks awesome as well as comfy and looks cute as hell! So now I'm returning the L one and will totally keep the M one. Who knows, maybe I've ended up getting a second M one specially if they provide other design more on the costume area for some superheroes etc etc
customer_reviews.author: Seeblah

customer_reviews.title: Super sized!
customer_reviews.text: I heeded the reviews that said to size down. I ordered a L instead of an XL. The large is super big. I won’t exchange it though because it is so cozy. The reason for the star loss is that the feet are made of the same material as the rest and I guess I expected them to be reinforced more? Or maybe have little grippy things on the bottom to help with traction... not that sliding isn’t super fun. I’m just worried I’m going to wear through the feet this winter!
customer_reviews.author: duckie

customer_reviews.title: NOT PROPORTIONED CORRECTLY
customer_reviews.text: Arms were that of a small (which I ordered) . . . legs were that of an extra large. Seriously, this was long enough to fit my 6'2" boyfriend, but the arms would have been up to his elbows. My son wanted this to bum about the house in. He is 5'2" . . . the arms fit him but the legs were 2 times as long as they should have been. Very odd.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: fun, warm
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my college son and my 12 year old son. Cute, fun, warm. Not as soft as the softest fleece that's out there. Polyester so can get some static. My kids do like them, though. Great that there's a zipper opening in the back so they can use the bathroom without taking the whole thing off. Feet don't have any padding or reinforcement. We'll have to see how they hold up. Medium fits my son who is 5'10 and 180 pounds. Extra small is too big for my 5' 110 pound 12 year old, but it's still wearable.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Huerstel

customer_reviews.title: Save electricity - wear a onesie!
customer_reviews.text: I got this onesie for a party and fell in love with it. It is comfortable, warm, breathable. Better than other onesies I've tried in the past and the tie dye is great. Love the butt flap (which took some getting used to) and hood! I can keep my house at 60 in the winter without having to pack on the layers. Looking forward to winter festivals with this. My only complaint is the size - I'm tall and usually an XL but this is overly baggy, so much so that the feet often slide off going down stairs or over carpet. When (yes when) I buy a replacement it will be a smaller size. Getchu one!
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Very nice, soft
customer_reviews.text: Husband loves this! He is 6' 4" and 240 lbs. with size 13 feet. Got the XL & fits perfectly, plenty of extra room, so he can move around in it. Very nice, soft, plush material that keeps him nice and toasty in the cold. Got the 2XXL, initially, but it was TOO long and big. I was skeptical but we sent it back for the smaller XL and it is still plenty big and long! What a great product for adults and a reasonable price, as well! I had an adult friend who wanted one of these, about 10 years ago, but could not find Adult Onesies. So glad someone filled this need! Great Product.
customer_reviews.author: Melwel

customer_reviews.title: They really do run big...but they're AWESOME! :D
customer_reviews.text: So cute! They truly do run huge so I'm exchanging the XL for L (I'm a 6' tall woman, 36" inseam, size 12 feet, dress size 18/20). The quality felt great, and they're totally adorable! Nice feature I hadn't noticed in the description is the pass-through pocket zippers; just behind the pockets are zippers that allow you to access your underlayers, if you're wearing any...so you can get things out of your pockets if you're wearing jeans or whatever underneath..because, you know, Snuggy pub crawls are so 2015 ;)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super fun and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing. I wore it 3 days straight when I first got it. The weather is getting too warm here but as soon as it is chilly again it will be back on! Its like a blanket wrapped around you all the time! It also has zippers for easy access to the bathroom so you don't have to take it off and on. I honestly might get more colors. Only thing I didnt like was that they were out of the original print I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly comfy and roomy
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a small (knowing that they run large) wanting to feel like I am wearing a warm, fuzzy blanket. I LOVE THIS THING. It is flowy, warm, soft and cute (I have the skulls and stars). My bestie got a matching duckie one, and we are gonna rock them in this time of quarantine like it's an official uniform! Ok, well, at least I am, she is way more of an adult than me. Enjoy warm, happy naps, fellow onesie lovers.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the XXL for my husband, he's 6'3" and about 375 lbs. It shockingly fits perfectly with a little room to spare. I'm glad I actually paid attention to the provided measurements. The material is a nice quality, feels warm. He loves it. The price point is a little more than the average adult onesie listed on Amazon but for what I received, I won't complain.
customer_reviews.author: J J

customer_reviews.title: Love these footies just make sure to get the right size.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome footie pajamas however make sure to read their sizing guide and don't go just based on other footie pajamas you own. I already own a footie in xl so I bought an xl in these and had to return it and got a medium which is a muuch better fit. Overall great footies once you get the right size. It has two zippers and you can just undo a small portion on the bottom to pee without unzipping the entire thing. Also love the butt flap :D
customer_reviews.author: B92

customer_reviews.title: Oversized and Snuggly
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the onsie is great! Wore it for a cold snowy Onsie Crawl event and it kept me very warm. The material is quality, the foot part is removable which is awesome and it is designed to have an oversize fit. I am 5'6ht and 285 and the XXL fit great and i had bonus room. I would purchase it again! It’s worth the money and it held up great in the washing machine- it didn’t fade or shrink.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Using for a costume party.
customer_reviews.text: I'm actually using the onesie for a costume party. It was perfect for making a dinosaur costume. I love that the feet are removable and there is also a zippered rear for bathroom breaks. Cozy and warm. I did exchange for a smaller size as it was a bit bigger than I expected, but the exchange was simple.
customer_reviews.author: lovesamazon

customer_reviews.title: So so cozy!
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing. We ended up buying several for the whole family. Like wearing a giant blanket, and I love the buttflap for going to the bathroom. Also like that the feet zip off and that they have huge pockets. Absolutely worth the price!! They do seem to run a bit big but that's a plus in my book, it seems on purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Mullen

customer_reviews.title: The length is still fine but his chest has gotten broader and his arms ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son whose room is in the basement so it stays cooler than the rest of the house. He loves them. He's 5ft 8 about 150 lbs. They fit with plenty of leg room if he hits another growth spurt. He rarely takes them off. He was tickled by the double zipper and opening in the back. 7/12/17: He has since outgrown this onesie. The length is still fine but his chest has gotten broader and his arms longer so the sleeves come above his wrists. I will be purchasing a M this year.
customer_reviews.author: Elle

customer_reviews.title: Change your life!
customer_reviews.text: OMG!!! Can I live in this? Love it!!!! There is not much more that I can say that others haven't already but this onesie has it all and is the best! Super Comfy. I am sitting in it now, not wanting to get dressed for the day. Why bother? Solid zippers. Butt Flap. Hood. Over sized for comfort. I got the Reindeer Games print. Its very festive and seasonal. Bold and bright. Only complaint is I somehow tore a seem in the leg just below my boys. Its not form fitting so I can get away with it. Even with this snafu, I would buy another in a heartbeat.
customer_reviews.author: Matt M.

customer_reviews.title: Was kind of in-between sizes so opted for the large ...
customer_reviews.text: Was kind of in-between sizes so opted for the large vice the medium per the sites recommendation, It's a little too big but I have plenty of room, the only thing that worked well was the sleeve length for my long lanky arms. My recommendation if you're in-between sizes order a medium and a large and send the one back that doesn't work for you. The product looks to be made well, unsure on how it will hold up after several washes...if it doesn't I'll do a follow-up
customer_reviews.author: Timbo

customer_reviews.title: Not the greatest quality fleece...
customer_reviews.text: The tie dye design is ok. There is an overwhelming amount of red. It would have been nice to have a more even amount of color. The fleece is not the soft nice kind of fleece that is inside a new sweater for example. It is a little scratchy and seems like a cheap fleece - not good quality. I'm not sure I would recommend it if you are going for comfort or something to really wear around the house. The colors are ok but again not enough of a tie dye pattern. It's a neat idea but it could have been a lot better. My son doesn't seem to care but I would not buy one for myself.
customer_reviews.author: Doobydoo

customer_reviews.title: Great gift to keep you cozy
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a gift for my boyfriend and he absolutely loves them. If it was just too bright not too tight or too loose and has just enough wiggle room they also keep him very warm and he enjoys being able to be comfortable and warm without too much effort or hassle. The only downside he has noticed is the fact that he can't sleep in them because he gets and stays way too warm.
customer_reviews.author: Karissa

customer_reviews.title: BUY THESE!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THEM! I've tried for weeks to find myself a onesi. I'm "plus-sized" so when I found these I thought I'd give it a shot. I am madly in love with these! the feet flop about so I have to pull my pant legs up while walking but a small price to pay for such cozy lounge out jammies.
customer_reviews.author: R. Rubel

customer_reviews.title: I may need another one!
customer_reviews.text: Oh goodness! This is one of the fave items of clothing I have. I bought it for a pajama themed New Years party and I'm really thinking about getting another one. It's so warm and perfect for lounging around with my little one watching movies. Plus he thinks it's great that we have the same kind of pajamas!
customer_reviews.author: Dani Carr

customer_reviews.title: Oh my god no. No. No. No.
customer_reviews.text: Ugh these are horrific! Not sure how there are so many positive reviews?? These smell super flammable. That's the best I could describe the smell. Softness? No. No. No. No. Omg no. They feel like what I imagine a burnt wolverine's ass would feel like. Find something else.
customer_reviews.author: Joey S

customer_reviews.title: Soft and cozy
customer_reviews.text: I brought this as a gift for my son. As a kid, he loved the one-piece blanket PJ's. For years I have been looking for just the right one, and this is it. He LOVES it, with the feet, and the zipper back-flap. He said, "he knows what he will be living in this winter". I plan on buying him another for Christmas, and maybe one for his brother also.
customer_reviews.author: SCline

customer_reviews.title: Warm, cozy and rear-pocket bathroom easy
customer_reviews.text: Omg sooooo so so cozy and warm. The only thing i need between me and my sheets on those cold east coast winter nights. Fit well. The rear pocket means you don't have to take it off your shoulders, like some others, to go peepee lol. That gets cold.
customer_reviews.author: Shelley F.

customer_reviews.title: This item is so disproportionate-- it's terribly wide in the body
customer_reviews.text: Bought a size Medium for my 5'11" 180 lb husband, based on the size description you'd think it should fit. This item is so disproportionate-- it's terribly wide in the body, the legs appear to be short, but the feet size is what blew me away! The feet are extremely narrow and short. I don't know of any man that is that large with lady-sized feet. Back they go.
customer_reviews.author: smoop

customer_reviews.title: Best onesie ever!
customer_reviews.text: Finally a onesie with a drop seat and pockets! Feet zip off which is good since they run a little short. I could live in this thing. So comfy. Great for camping on chilly nights
customer_reviews.author: sharon lokey

customer_reviews.title: Cute and Cuddly
customer_reviews.text: I bought this footed onesie for my 6'4" husband, however, I did buy him the large instead of the extra large and it fit him perfectly. The quality of this onesie was totally unexpected...lol. It is fleece material and it is very well made. I plan to order one for myself.
customer_reviews.author: Tess

customer_reviews.title: This is the best thing ever
customer_reviews.text: This is the best thing ever. Incredibly soft and warm but totally breathable as well. The hood fits and can be adjusted and feet fit well too. There's a zippered butt flap and two pockets but the rest is all just a large piece of super soft fleece that barely shrinks in the dryer. I got the medium and I'm 5'8.5 and a size 16 in women's sizes and it fits well but is also big enough to be comfortable. I have no idea why I didn't buy this years ago.
customer_reviews.author: TINA

customer_reviews.title: Might be my favorite thing ever.
customer_reviews.text: Everything about this is wonderful. I have had it since Christmas and I wear it nearly every day. So much so, that I’ve considered getting another. These Midwest winters can be harsh! But these pajamas keep me toasty. I’m 6’1” and they fit perfectly. I really appreciate that the feet can zip off.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: It does run big...and I LOVE it!
customer_reviews.text: I have wanted one of these for a while and I’m so glad I got it. It’s awesome and the back flap is genius! I do wish someone would sew the protective plastic feet on these because I’m concerned that they’ll wear out over time, but so far so good! I’m 5’6” and about 160lbs and bought the small-and it’s still big. And awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Vitreoso

customer_reviews.title: It was not a teddy bear,
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son (aged 48) he likes it very much. However, I was a bit to quick on the order button,I just glanced at it and thought it was a teddy bear. When it arrived I saw it was monkeys!!! Probably more appropriate!! I felt the price was good and again the shipping is always on time. Next time I shall wear my glasses
customer_reviews.author: beachnana

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable article of clothing I own!! Must have!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Honestly I cannot put into words how much I love this product. I bought two more so I can alternate them and wear them daily. Most comfortable thing I own. If you are contemplating it just trust me you will not regret the purchase no matter what. I’m actually going to be buying more for myself and the wife.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Finally a onesie for plus size bodies!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are so cozy and warm. I ended up ordering to big of one but it's perfect especially if you want to wear extra clothes underneath. I will have to order more but I'd say the fit is what they say it is. I'm so used to having to order larger than what they say the size is. Definitely not the case with these. Finally a onesie that is made to fit larger body types. Thank you!!! I just wish there were more design choices. I really wanted the the dye one but it was only in the small size. Will definitely order more in the future
customer_reviews.author: Susan B

customer_reviews.title: Life changing
customer_reviews.text: This is the best thing I have ever bought in my whole life. I love it so much. Perfect fit, the most comfy thing I've ever worn, warm but breathable, all the features and good ones, durable quality, soft material. Best thing ever for lounging but I also use it when I shovel snow. It's better than a bath robe too. It also looks cool. You can literally buy this for anyone so it even eliminates Christmas shopping stress. I think Ron Swanson would approve this product if that says anything.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Muller

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and huge
customer_reviews.text: I know I sized up but I should have sized down...it was hugeeeeeeeee! Better too big than too small 🤷🏻‍♀️ It wasn’t that soft maybe just a cheap material but it works for what I wanted 🤷🏻‍♀️ Butt flap lol
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Foiles

customer_reviews.title: Warm
customer_reviews.text: This is thicker and WARM like a fleece blanket versus thin and silky soft. This is good for those who get cold and aren't around PETS that SHED. Would have bought another but the feet weirdly TIGHT in the WIDTH -never had that problem in any of our onesies in the past. It looks really cute like the pic.
customer_reviews.author: pickypeople

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE these PJs
customer_reviews.text: LOVE LOVE LOVE these PJs, my husband and I both have a pair for wearing around the house on chilly days/nights. They are super comfy and keep you warm without making you sweat. The fabric is nice, not cheap, and has held up to multiple washes. My only complaint is that it is a dog-hair-magnet! The feet get absolutely covered in our dogs hair, even when we've just vacuumed, I don't know where its coming from. They look a little ridiculous when you first put it on, but its totally worth it.
customer_reviews.author: SpaceCowGirl

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable. Run huge so size down as recommend
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable. As others have said, they run very big. I am 6' and 210, and a Medium is slightly baggy on me.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy John

customer_reviews.title: Good fit & quality
customer_reviews.text: My 13 yr. old son is a little on the smaller side for his age and got him the adult XS. Fits great. Have already washed a few times, looks just like new still. He puts it on every evening. In the pic of the tie-dye it looks more yellow but really the colors are evenly distributed. He insisted on this print, I actually like it better in person. He also thinks all the zippers (including in back) are funny.
customer_reviews.author: Murray fam

customer_reviews.title: XXS is huge
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5'2" and around 110lbs. I got the XXS and the crotch was at my knees. The sleeves were a good length, though, and the legs weren't too far off either if I held up the extra fabric so they started in about the right spot. I returned it due to it being so huge on me, but it seemed otherwise well-made - I wanted one with feet, pockets, and a functional back flap, and it has all of that. (I wish they had a size that came at least somewhat close to fitting shorter people.)
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn

customer_reviews.title: Onesies rule for camping!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product, it had all the features I needed. Onesies are the bomb for camping, you saw it here first! :) I am 5’8inches with large shoulders, small feet (size 8) and big bones. I normally order size large. For this Onesie, small fits me like a glove. As baggy as advertised! The only minor points: The elastics at the ankles are a bit tight (big bones). The fleece thickness is a hair too thin for camping. The front zipper dors not go high enough to keep the troat warm.
customer_reviews.author: Bruno Hache

customer_reviews.title: Follow the Sizing Chart
customer_reviews.text: This product is designed to be loose and comfortable. I followed the size chart and it fits my boyfriend perfectly at 6'3 and 270lbs. Such a great buy! I did note the fabric is not very thick but its fuzzy on the exterior so it collects alot of lint and dog hair.
customer_reviews.author: Blonde520

customer_reviews.title: Get you one..
customer_reviews.text: My husband really enjoys his onesie. I have to stop him from wearing it outside. It washes well and doesn't puck up alot of lint. It was alittle big on him but he really likes the size. He says it feel like he had a blanket on him.
customer_reviews.author: Donnetta

customer_reviews.title: For a true to size fit, order according to your height
customer_reviews.text: This onesie is so soft and comfortable that you’ll never want to take it off! The one thing about this product is that you should order it according to your height, not what size you normally are. I ordered my first onesie (yes, I had to have more than one, they’re so awesome!) in my normal size, and it was like a tent on me, although that isn’t necessarily a bad thing, as it adds to the extreme comfort of this product. But if you want a fit that’s more true to size, order according to your height!
customer_reviews.author: Mary G Hall

customer_reviews.title: Don’t Size Up! If Anything, Size Down.
customer_reviews.text: Oh man, SO comfy... I was worried it would fit a little snug, not at all the case. If anything, we could have sized down! Because of the extra fabric it hangs a little heavy, so it pulls you down a touch, but I just readjust it and go about my being-cozy. I low key wish it was acceptable to wear these in public...
customer_reviews.author: mahea_c

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect!
customer_reviews.text: These are so comfy. Only complaint is the 'foot' part of it is a little akward and slips around and off of my foot, but it doesnt effect the comfort or wearability. I could also see the feet being worn out quickly. It would be better if they added a grippy material, or even just something a little tougher to the sole of the footie. These are warm, but not overly hot. They run a little big, but I wouldnt want this to be tight fitting. I ordered the size I would normally order in a shirt, and it was plenty roomy.
customer_reviews.author: Reeser214

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Quarantine Gear
customer_reviews.text: Love that this has removable feet and the butt flap makes it so much easier to use daily ;) I'm 5'8" and ordered a small and its still plenty oversized. Very soft and comfortable. Only change I may suggest is different surface on the bottom outside of the feet, there is a different fabric lining for the feet but the same material as the body for the outer - just think it will get dirty and work fast if worn around a lot.
customer_reviews.author: N. Southern

customer_reviews.title: Very very itchy !!
customer_reviews.text: This is very very itchy ! I put it on and was itching all over. It felt like little itch things poking me. I took it off and looked at the tag and it said 100% polyester... maybe that’s why?? I don’t know but this thing is getting sent straight back!!
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda tate

customer_reviews.title: The Size Chart Was 100% correct! A+
customer_reviews.text: I'm 6'1" and I ordered the LARGE and it FIT PERFECTLY! I had a little wiggle room and it was very cozy with decent pockets and the zippers weren't cheaply made. My buddy is 6'7" and 320lbs and he ordered his in XL; wouldn't you know....FITS PERFECTLY on him and then we bought a group of them so needless to say; Highly recommend this Onesie brand and please pay attention to the SIZE CHART;-P
customer_reviews.author: Butch Davis

customer_reviews.title: Zipper is broken
customer_reviews.text: Super disappointed I got these and the zipper is broken and they are way to big. Living in an area where we don’t have any stores to shop at I was excited to see these since it’s been 20 degrees every morning. When the package arrived I took them out and tried them on just to find out that the zipper is broken and they are WAY to big
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super Comfy!
customer_reviews.text: This is the comfiest thing I have ever purchased. I am 5'3 and about 270lbs. I ordered the XXL mainly for my boobs to fit. But honestly I could have ordered a Large and it would have fit perfect. And XL would have been comfortably baggy. The XXL is WAAAAYYY to big, but I'm Waaayyy to lazy to send it back for an exchange. But either way, it's still super comfortable. The butt flap is cool. 10/10 would recommend this just for the butt flap. Nights when I'm freezing and miserable, I dont even have to get naked to pee. I stay toasty warm.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazingly soft, ultra comfy, fits for people with large feet
customer_reviews.text: This is the most amazing drunk purchase I have ever made. It fits perfectly, I love the butt flap, the feet actually fit which is rare for me on onesies (I’m average height with very large feet), and I love that this has a good. The material is soft and very washable (a friend puked on it and it did not get stained or retain any of the smell). The fleece hasn’t lost its softness even after a ton of washes. I LIVE in this thing when I’m not working
customer_reviews.author: Shea Polk

customer_reviews.title: Cozy, but..
customer_reviews.text: These do run very large, I'm 5'8 athletic build and I bought a small it was longer than I needed and very roomy, which makes it extremely comfortable. The material isn't as soft or thick as I'd hoped, just a single layer fabric. The design is the reason for only 4 stars from me, I ordered the skull print (there were only a couple prints available in small) and it's not very chill at all. I would return to exchange for one of the other 2 colors available but I already took the tags off 😖👎🏼
customer_reviews.author: hayley n.

customer_reviews.title: These are awesome!!!
customer_reviews.text: I did what everyone said and sized down...both husband and I normally wear Men’s L in these type. I bought mediums and they are perfect roomy and not tight at all. He’s 5 10 about 170 and I am normally about a women’s 14. I like them so well I just bought another two of the flag ones for the 4th of July
customer_reviews.author: BLACKDOG

customer_reviews.title: Cute & comfy!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my boyfriend, he absolutely loves it. It's super soft, warm, slightly larger than expected but he says its very comfortable. I personally think it makes him look like a bunny. Overall very happy with this purchase. Will likely buy one for myself
customer_reviews.author: Margareth D.

customer_reviews.title: Very soft and comfy!
customer_reviews.text: I really love this but sizing was a bit tough. I normally wear an XL-1X depending on item and have a medium in this. Its just how I would like it to fit loose and comfy around body, but the crotch extends halfway to my knees and the feet are extra long.. but for wearing around home alone when cold out its perfect. Wondering if the larger the size the taller you are assumed to be. ;-) Its also convenient for using the bathroom with a zipper across the back too.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Greatest purchase ever
customer_reviews.text: I am going to live in this thing! I ordered this onesie for a silly girls' night with some friends, and it is the greatest thing ever! The monkeys are really cute, and it is super soft! Seriously, this onesie is the most comfortable thing ever! For your sizing info: I'm 5'9" and 135 pounds. The medium was the right length, but it was very baggy. No worries, it still looks cute that way....as if that's your main concern when wearing a onesie. Maybe it is. Either way, you should buy this one.
customer_reviews.author: AHou

customer_reviews.title: Above average material
customer_reviews.text: They were perfect , very nice material, very well constructed. Several notches above the ordinary, quality zippers. One out of five didnot come with zip off feet..which is kinda important! If you are looking for a good, solid made indie, this is it. Material is very soft and comfy, don’t be afraid of the dropped crotch, it makes lounging wonderful with no pulling, and it adds to the fun!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: IT FITS tall guys!
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a long time for one of these that fit properly. i am a 6 foot 7 tall guy or 204cm. this thing fits perfectly. i am amazed at it. its crazy soft, feet are removable. there's not much else i can say. its perfect.
customer_reviews.author: scott

customer_reviews.title: My son loves it
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son. He is 12 years old and just over 5 feet tall so it is large for him -- but that was expected. We couldn't find large enough ones in boys sizes so we ordered this. He loves wearing it and should get several years out of it. The material feels nice and the stitching looks good.
customer_reviews.author: Kam14

customer_reviews.title: I hate pajamas but these are sooooooo comfy
customer_reviews.text: OK, I hate pajamas but these are sooooooo comfy! I have two pairs now and I sleep in them almost every night now while it's cold here. I bought a larger size on the first one and it's quite large --- wearable but very baggy. I ordered my normal size on the second pair and they have plenty of extra room. Definitely not summer time apparel unless you live in Alaska. :-)
customer_reviews.author: DebbieS26

customer_reviews.title: Accessible!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my Boo and they loved it! The construction is superb and the zipper access was amazingly clever. Bought a "lady" version for myself from another company and it had zero bathroom amenities like this one. Getting one of these instead! Plus this one is soooooo thick and warm!
customer_reviews.author: tch

customer_reviews.title: Son loves it!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my 20 year old son. He is about 5'9 (maybe 5'10") and weighs 145 lbs. I originally purchased a medium which was a bit big on him. I then ordered a small which fits perfectly. He decided to keep both, one for while at college and one left at home. He loves the monkeys, the feet, the hood, and all zippered openings. He wears it everyday. Seems to be well constructed.
customer_reviews.author: Teri Hineline

customer_reviews.title: This is so ideal for sleeping and just hanging out ...
customer_reviews.text: This is so ideal for sleeping and just hanging out in my apartment. Plus it's so warm! I'm 5'11" and 187lbs, and the medium fits just right. And did I mention? It's really warm :)
customer_reviews.author: SamIAm

customer_reviews.title: No shape to it and too large.
customer_reviews.text: I had to return this as it didn't fit me properly and looked like a sack on me. I purchased the gray which didn't help matters, I had much better luck with another brand. This just didn't work out for me.
customer_reviews.author: Blossom's Mom

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: I'm exactly 6 feet, 165 and wear size 12 shoes. Length wise, it fits perfectly and is a loose fit. I got the powder blue in Large
customer_reviews.author: Timothy McGivney

customer_reviews.title: Comfy
customer_reviews.text: Just received my onesie! Tried it on and it was super comfy. I almost forgot I was just trying them on and not wearing them for the rest of day. My only complaint is that I’m 5’1 and have small feet. So it is super baggy around the ankle and the feet are too big but that’s too be expected with a size 6.5 shoe size.
customer_reviews.author: ChayDenae

customer_reviews.title: This is usually a great product but received one that appears slightly used and ...
customer_reviews.text: This is usually a great product but received one that appears slightly used and returned. Pulled it out the package and was disappointed it had dog hairs all over. Not sure what happened here I have bought 2 other ones with no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Kologne

customer_reviews.title: mad comfy
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for a pajama night on a cruise and it was a pretty big hit. Thought I'd never wear it again but it's too comfy not to. Wash it once or twice when you first get it, otherwise it's unbearably hot. Now it is comfy as all getout. I'm 5'11 175lb and the medium is a good fit. A little loose in the footsies but that's fine.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: he loves to super soft things and this did not disappoint
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my son for Christmas. Although he is a teenager, he loves to super soft things and this did not disappoint. In the cooler winter weather he wore this quite frequently. He would probably prefer that I run the AC super cold so he can wear this now in the Texas heat!!! I highly recommend this for anyone who wants a full body "snuggie".
customer_reviews.author: FDJ

customer_reviews.title: Use size chart
customer_reviews.text: Take the size chart literally for this one. I ordered a size up so it would be more comfortable but I should have ordered my exact size from the size chart. It ended up being too big so I gave to brother-in-law. This onesie is great for larger or tall men- I have found other brands don’t carry large enough sizes.
customer_reviews.author: HK

customer_reviews.title: Cozy and spacious, but not very warming.
customer_reviews.text: Cozy and spacious, but if you're looking for something to contribute to keeping you warm, keep scrolling. I live in SoCal and don't use heat in 'winter' and my place leaks. Using this in the morning would need something else to go with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bring your goggles and snorkel Bc you’re swimming
customer_reviews.text: Ordered XS. Insanely too big. I’m 6’ and 200 lbs. I am a 44 jacket, 34 waist and wear lg/xl tee shirts. It only barely too small on me. Purchased for my son. He’s drowning in it. Either mismarked or suddenly I’ve shrunken.
customer_reviews.author: J_lo280

customer_reviews.title: Comfy
customer_reviews.text: I've been practically living in my Forever Lazy onesie since getting it two weeks ago. As many reviewers have said, the sizing is quite large. I'm 5'9" tall and 170 lbs, and the Small fits comfortably with plenty of room. So far, the material is holding up well. The front zipper has pulls at top and bottom, which is useful when nature calls, as is the zippered rear flap.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Garlington

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic pjs!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my 5’3”& 154lb grandson; a men’s small gives him room to grow ( almost too big, but supposed to be roomy/oversized)& the quality of the garment ensures he’ll have these for years! Very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: L. anderson

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable  love the American flag style pajamas
customer_reviews.text: I love how this pajama fits it’s soft and warm the rear zipper flap is great as it stays shut no buttons and the feet also zip off if you want.i wear them at night relaxing around the house before bed, I don’t sleep in them It would be too warm but totally comfortable to hang out in all night long.
customer_reviews.author: A.M.

customer_reviews.title: A bit warm
customer_reviews.text: During the pandemic I often wear this 24/7. The pattern is shocking, and I wonder what my neighbors think when I take out the trash. Lots of zippers for easy access to any body part.
customer_reviews.author: S Bannon

customer_reviews.title: Cute and Comfy, but very large
customer_reviews.text: I like the look and feel, but there is so much extra room in these i think i could fit a second person in them. I ordered an medium, which fit well head to toe, but in the torso there is so much room
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase.  Wife Loves.
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves this "Warmsie". She is super cold natured and loves to sleep in it or just wear it around the house. The rear flap works perfectly for her, as she hates the idea of onesies because of the usual need to fully strip to use the restroom. Not anymore. As mentioned regularly, aim for the smaller of sizes, if you have any doubts. The only sad thing is that, after over a year of use and washes, there are holes in the soles of the foot pads. Otherwise, has held up well. Will get her another one soon enough.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Crawford

customer_reviews.title: My Grandson loves them
customer_reviews.text: the pajamas were slightly large but my grandson didn't mind - wore them immediately - he is a big 14 yr 0old - about 5'-6" and 140# - very long legs - think maybe a small would have been okay but i'd rather err on the large size - all told as very good buy.
customer_reviews.author: katydids

customer_reviews.title: Forever Lazy Footed Adult Onesie, size Medium
customer_reviews.text: I debated whether I should order large or medium thinking the size might run small. I'm 5' 8-1/2" and 190 lbs. I ordered medium and am happy to say it fits me very well. The material is soft and warm and comfortable whether standing or sitting. There is just enough elastic around the ankles to keep the feet in place while walking. The sleeves are a perfect length and It also has two nice sized pockets. I'm very satisfied with my purchase and would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel lj

product_meta.title: Forever Lazy Footed Adult Onesies, One-Piece Pajama Jumpsuits for Men and Women, Unisex. with Detachable Feet.
feature_bullets: RELAXED, UNISEX SIZING - Our sizing does not follow any traditional sizing because the onesies are unisex. As a result, it is extremely important that you follow our Forever Lazy size chart in the secondary images. Start with the height column on the size chart, then slide over and make sure your weight is within the size for your height. If not, size up until your weight is found.

SOFT, COMFORTABLE MATERIAL - Our Forever Lazy onesies are made with a high quality, 100% polyester fleece that is ultra soft and anti-pill. Our onesies can be conveniently laundered at home with a washing machine. Simply add the onesie to a load with like colors, wash in cold water, and then tumble dry on a low heat setting or hang dry.

ZIPPER DETACHABLE FEET AND REAR ZIPPER DROP SEAT - Our onesies feature a hidden zipper tract that allow users to remove or re-attach the feet as desired thus offering the versatility of both a footed and non-footed pajama. This also comes equipped with a concealed, rear zipper drop seat is conveniently located on the back side of the onesie, so you never have to take it off, even to use the restroom.

DEEP SIDE POCKETS & HOOD - Our onesies feature extra deep side pockets that will fit just about anything you would ever need to carry around with you, including a remote, your cell phone, a water bottle, or even a snack! The hood is equipped with drawstrings and will keep your head warm on the chilliest of nights.

GIVE THE GIFT OF LAZINESS - A comfortable pair of one-piece pajamas is a thoughtful way of telling him or her, "You deserve to relax, and do nothing for a long time" - making for very fun and unique present.
